column2: lunch here is crazy mad crowded!  I should have known
column3: but thankfully my friend and I were enjoying a leisure "OMG
column4: let's catch up on gossip" afternoon
column6: no lives were lost.  Although I did manage to splash half of glass of water onto myself while attempting to refill my water because that's just how Ellen C. does it.  No but seriously y'all
column7: when I was a mere kiddo and out with my family and relatives
column8: they would all jokingly take bets on when I would spill my drink.  Not whether I would
